betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Soap

These special items provide a quick and effective way to manage Warp buildup.

Usage: Hold down the right mouse button to instantly remove all Temporary Warp and reduce Normal Warp by 1 point.
Enhanced Effects:
While immersed in Purified Water or under the protection of the Warp Ward effect, using the item will reduce Normal Warp by 2 points.
If both conditions are met, the reduction increases to 3 points.
These consumables are invaluable for thaumaturges delving into dangerous research or areas filled with corruptive influences.
